Name: Label
Description: Text display control with styling and formatting.

Properties.Name: CharacterSpacing
Properties.Description: Spacing between characters in the label text.

Properties.Name: Text
Properties.Description: The text displayed by the label.

Properties.Name: FontFamily
Properties.Description: Font family used by the label.

Properties.Name: FontSize
Properties.Description: Font size of the label text.

Properties.Name: FontAutoScalingEnabled
Properties.Description: Enables automatic font scaling according to accessibility settings.

Properties.Name: TextTransform
Properties.Description: Transform applied to the label text (None, Uppercase, Lowercase).

Properties.Name: TextDecorations
Properties.Description: Text decorations such as underline or strikethrough.

Properties.Name: LineBreakMode
Properties.Description: How the text wraps or truncates.

Properties.Name: LineHeight
Properties.Description: Line height multiplier for the text.

Properties.Name: MaxLines
Properties.Description: Maximum number of lines to display.

Properties.Name: TextType
Properties.Description: Whether text is plain or HTML-like formatted.

Constructors.Description: Creates a Label and sets its text from any object.
Creates a Label whose text is provided by a function.
Creates a Label with function-based text bound to a component state provider.
